attributes.action: start to charge foreign hgv and psv vehicles that come to the UK .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: start to charge foreign hgv and psv vehicles that come to the UK fully fuelled, and therefore pay no tax on fuel and make no contribution to the upkeep of our roads. The only contribution they make is to road congestion and the wear and tear on our roads.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
